channel.title: Degrading barrows.... a slight issue

item.title: Degrading barrows.... a slight issue
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

[code]if (toragsHP == 500){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4958))
if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == (4964))
if(playerEquipment[playerLegs] == (4970))
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == (4952)){
toragsHP -= hitDiff * 2;
}
} else if (toragsHP == 375){
sendMessage(“Your Torags have degraded! Check your inventory!”);
deleteequiment(4958, playerWeapon);
deleteequiment(4964, playerChest);
deleteequiment(4970, playerLegs);

addItem(4959, 1);
addItem(4965, 1);
addItem(4971, 1);
addItem(4953, 1);
}

if (toragsHP == 375){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4959))
if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == (4965))
if(playerEquipment[playerLegs] == (4971))
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == (4953)){
toragsHP -= hitDiff / 2;
}
} else if (toragsHP == 250){
sendMessage(“Your Torags have degraded! Check your inventory!”);
deleteequiment(4960, playerWeapon);
deleteequiment(4966, playerChest);
deleteequiment(4971, playerLegs);
deleteequiment(4953, playerHat);
addItem(4961, 1);
addItem(4966, 1);
addItem(4972, 1);
addItem(4954, 1);

}

if (toragsHP >= 250) {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4959))
if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == (4965))
if(playerEquipment[playerLegs] == (4971))
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == (4953)){
deleteequiment(4959, playerWeapon);
deleteequiment(4965, playerChest);
deleteequiment(4971, playerLegs);
deleteequiment(4953, playerHat);
addItem(4960, 1);
addItem(4966, 1);
addItem(4972, 1);
addItem(4954, 1);

}
}
if (toragsHP >= 250) {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4959))
if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == (4965))
if(playerEquipment[playerLegs] == (4971))
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == (4953)){
deleteItem(4959, getItemSlot(4959), 1);
deleteItem(4965, getItemSlot(4965), 1);
deleteItem(4971, getItemSlot(4971), 1);
deleteItem(4953, getItemSlot(4953), 1);
addItem(4960, 1);
addItem(4966, 1);
addItem(4972, 1);
addItem(4954, 1);
}
}[/code]

thats my torags degrade code.

its at the top of my pking and wep deley codes in boolean attack()

so under it is

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) // rune scimi here { PkingDelay = 8; wepdelay = 8; }
earlier… i was testing my c bow.
and then… my torags degraded?
it was weird.
i can simply put this at the bottom, but then again, my other barrows are going to go there too. so how would i stop this problem…

oh and btw… WEWT IT WORKS… i guess…

Read full topic
